00044 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00045 // Name: class CMyD3DApplication
00046 // Desc: Application class. The base class (CD3DApplication) provides the 
00047 //       generic functionality needed in all Direct3D samples. CMyD3DApplication 
00048 //       adds functionality specific to this sample program.
00049 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00050 class CMyD3DApplication : public CD3DApplication
00051 {
00052     BOOL                    m_bLoadingApp;          // TRUE, if the app is loading
00053     CD3DFont*               m_pFont;                // Font for drawing text
00054 
00055     FLOAT                   m_fSoundPlayRepeatCountdown; // Sound repeat timer
00056     CSoundManager*          m_pSoundManager;        // DirectSound manager class
00057 
00058 protected:
00059     virtual HRESULT OneTimeSceneInit();
00060     virtual HRESULT InitDeviceObjects();
00061     virtual HRESULT RestoreDeviceObjects();
00062     virtual HRESULT InvalidateDeviceObjects();
00063     virtual HRESULT DeleteDeviceObjects();
00064     virtual HRESULT Render();
00065     virtual HRESULT FrameMove();
00066     virtual HRESULT FinalCleanup();
00067     virtual HRESULT ConfirmDevice( D3DCAPS9*, DWORD, D3DFORMAT );
00068 
00069     HRESULT RenderText();
00070 
00071     HRESULT InitAudio( HWND hWnd );
00072 
00073     VOID    ReadSettings();
00074     VOID    WriteSettings();
00075 
00076 public:
00077     LRESULT MsgProc( HWND hWnd, UINT msg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam );
00078     CMyD3DApplication();
00079     virtual ~CMyD3DApplication();
00080 
00081     class Scene*            m_pScene;                           // Scene Graph
